com.defano.jmonet.canvas.layer

Interface ScaledLayeredImage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LayeredImage
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PaintCanvas
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPaintCanvas, AbstractPaintSurface, JMonetCanvas

    public interface ScaledLayeredImage
extends LayeredImage
    An image with multiple layers that can be drawn at scale.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getScale()
      Gets the displayed scale factor of this image.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.canvas.layer.LayeredImage

        getImageLayers, getSize, paint, render

    • Method Detail

      • getScale

        double getScale()
        Gets the displayed scale factor of this image. A scale of 1.0 means no scaling; a value of 2.0 means the image should be drawn at a 2:1 scale.
        Returns:
        The displayed scale factor of this image.
